pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 29, 2016:

Calgary

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable on Employment Insurance.

Kerby Centre
Gymnasium
1133 7 Ave SW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

12:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Kerby Centre
Gymnasium
1133 7 Ave SW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Open media coverage

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology Polytechnic.

SAIT Polytechnic
ThomasRiley Building
1301 16 Avenue NW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.

Media appearance

5:00 p.m. News Hour, Global Calgary

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
